name: Afterlife Keys
description:
The first mini game you are a single cell organism and the only control needed is the mouse. When you become the fish the w,a,s,d keys are needed and to float upwards the space bar.  

The first scene contains 1 key, The second scene contains 2. I was planning on hiding more keys and make it more of a find as many as you can though time did not allow to add more scenes. 

IN development... 

Source2.zip contains asset links, The OBJ files are files I designed in the past and worked well for this environment. 

Audio files - https://www.zapsplat.com/
